long_description: Designed for young swimmers, the girls' Tyr Swimple swim goggles feature an quick-release button for no-fuss headstrap adjustments, making it easy for children to adjust it on their own. Goggles sport a small frame and a comfortable, secure fit on the face. Soft, hypoallergenic silicone gaskets help provide a watertight seal. Featuring optical-grade polycarbonate lenses, the Tyr Swimple swim goggles are antifog and UV protective. Comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: Designed for young swimmers, the girls' Tyr Swimple swim goggles feature an quick-release button for no-fuss headstrap adjustments, making it easy for children to adjust it on their own.
